SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Player

Class CardVisibility

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Player.CardVisibility
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CardVisibility extends Object implements Serializable
This class is instanced before playing a card, it stores information about how a card is being played specifically if it's been placed face up or face down and the visibility of its corners when it's being placed and when it will be covered by other cards. This class is then stored in the Model.Player.CardMap. and is what the CardMap class will interact with to talk to the cards.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CardVisibility(Card card, boolean faceUp)
    Default Constructor.
    Stores information about card's face orientation and sets all corners' visibility to true as by the game's definition when placing a card it can only be placed on top of other cards meaning all of its corners will be visible.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardVisibility

      public CardVisibility(Card card, boolean faceUp)
      Default Constructor.
      Stores information about card's face orientation and sets all corners' visibility to true as by the game's definition when placing a card it can only be placed on top of other cards meaning all of its corners will be visible.
      Parameters:
      card - Card this instance of CardVisibility is being instanced for.
      faceUp - Boolean face orientation of the card, if true card is placed face-up.

  • Method Details

    • getCornerVisibility

      public boolean getCornerVisibility(CornerDirection cornerDirection)
      Returns visibility value of specified corner.
      Parameters:
      cornerDirection - int index of corner in the Array cornerVisibility to be returned.
      Returns:
      boolean value of corner at specified index in Array.

    • getCornerArtifact

      protected Artifacts getCornerArtifact(CornerDirection cornerDirection)
      Method that returns the Artifact that is currently found on the visible side of the card on the specified corner.
      Parameters:
      cornerDirection - Corner from which to get the Artifact.
      Returns:
      Artifact contained in the corner.

    • getCornerType

      protected CornerType getCornerType(CornerDirection cornerDirection)
      Method that returns the CornerType of the specified corner direction currently found on the visible side of the card.
      Parameters:
      cornerDirection - Corner from which to get the CornerType
      Returns:
      CornerType of the corner

    • getAllArtifacts

      protected Map<Artifacts,Integer> getAllArtifacts()
      Method that returns a Map containing all artifacts on the visible face of the card.
      It is used when updating the counter in CardMap when a new card is placed to get all the new Artifacts all at once.
      Returns:
      Map with all Artifacts on card's visible side.

    • getCardColor

      protected Artifacts getCardColor()
      Returns:
      Artifact representing the color of the card.

    • isFaceUp

      public boolean isFaceUp()
      Returns boolean value of the card's face orientation: true face is up, false face is down.
      Returns:
      Boolean isFaceUp. if true the face is up, if false the face is covered.

    • getCard

      public Card getCard()

    • coverCorner

      protected void coverCorner(CornerDirection cornerDirection)
      Method to update corner visibility once a corner gets covered by a new card being placed on top of it.
      Parameters:
      cornerDirection - Position of the corner in the Array

    • toRecord

      public CardVisibilityRecord toRecord()
      Converts the current state of the card visibility into a CardVisibilityRecord object. This method retrieves the corners of the card based on the specified visibility (faceUp or faceDown), constructs a map of corner directions to corners, and creates a new CardVisibilityRecord with the card color, corner information, and visibility details.
      Returns:
      the CardVisibilityRecord representing the current visibility state of the card
